name: Cool Cat Bummin'
description:
Santana the alley cat is looking forward to a night at the bar. Only problem is he's broke as shit. Help him make some drinking money by selling loose cigarettes to chain-smoking pugs while making sure the cops are content enough to not arrest you...And remember, don't smoke your own supply!

CONTROLS:
Left/Right Arrow to move
Up Arrow to jump
Z to interact with characters
X to pick up loose cigs
